input.text: Second, we are going to create our Droplet. Navigate to Droplets and click the button Create Droplet. Choose a region the closest to your location. Select the Ubuntu 22 image. Pick the smallest size for your Virtual Machine. Choose as authentication method your SSH key. Finally give your Droplet a name and click the button Create Droplet. Remember the IP address of your droplet. For this tutorial it will be 46.101.80.89
